translation: Dhrishtaketu, Chekitana, the valiant king of Kasi, Purujit, Kuntibhoja, and Saibya—the best of men.
commentary: 1.5 Dhrishtaketu Dhrishtaketu? Chekitana: Chekitana? Kasirajah king of Kasi? f and? mighty valiant? Purujit Purujit? Kuntibhoja Kuntibhoja? f and? Shaibyaḥ son of Sibi? f and? Narapungavah the best of men.No Commentary.
